comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Leaving New York City [at the outbreak of WWI] to fight for the Kaiser in Europe.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of German reservists leaving New York City:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5793150967/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 51177259@N07
comment._content: Like this image.... [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5793150967/in/photostream] ...this is not Broadway but 5th Avenue. The reservists are marching northward. Behind them is the east side of 5th Avenue north from the 29th Street intersection (visible on far right). We've mapped it on SepiaTown if you'd like to take a look... [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51177259@N07/5996503764/in/photostream] www.sepiatown.com/813339/German-Reservists-Marching-on-5t...
